backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user auth, profiles, subscription data, quotas, posts, listings, and helper functions for managing user-related state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping subscription-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI sections, components, hooks, and generator logic.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: IC asset configuration defining caching rules and security headers for all served frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading Google Analytics and mounting the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling routing-like section refs, global context, identity auth, demo mode, and modals.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Auth dialog with sign‑in/sign‑up tabs, Google login, error handling, and success confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Google‑style button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading states.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI providing Internet Identity login/logout, error display, and a Google-styled sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows a dev-only alert banner listing IC config or actor initialization issues, with dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating the user's plan (free, pro, or creator) with different styles and icons.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Applies a fade‑in animation when the element enters view, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: Provides hooks to fetch authenticated user data including downloads, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Mutation hook that upserts a user auth record after Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Generates downloadable card images using canvas, including backgrounds, text rendering, and premium card export.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image for canvas rendering with cross‑origin support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Creates a printable PDF‑style page in a new window using pack content and an optional watermark.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Wraps text into multiple canvas lines based on max width, capped at 12 lines.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a community post card with title, description, creator info, and follow/view actions using follow state hooks.
Shows a modal with full community post details, creator info, timestamps, and follow button logic.
Provides a dialog form for creating new community posts with title, type, description, and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks to fetch all community posts or a specific post from the backend actor.
Mutation hook to create a community post, trigger cache invalidation, and show success/error toasts.
Manages following creators via local storage, backend subscription, and exposes hooks for follow actions and checking follow status.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Exports several predefined sample birthday wishes with metadata like name, relationship, and tone.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Defines selectable relationships, tones, languages, and personalities for the birthday generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a generated birthday pack into a structured text block for sharing.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates a birthday pack using language-specific phrases, creating wish text, captions, speech, and hashtags.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides birthday message phrase sets for English, Hinglish, and Hindi and a helper to select phrases by language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized form data using predefined sample names and constant option lists.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines types for generator form fields, birthday pack structure, and template identifiers.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: Implements a dialog for creating marketplace listings with validation, authentication checks, and submission via a mutation hook.
Displays a marketplace listing card with metadata, price, and a button to open the request‑to‑buy dialog.
Provides a dialog for contacting sellers, previewing a prefilled message, copying it, sending via WhatsApp, and recording buyer interest.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: Defines a mutation hook to create marketplace listings and handles success/error toast notifications.
Defines a mutation hook to record buyer interest in a listing and refresh listing data.
Queries the interaction count for a listing when authenticated.
Provides hooks to load all listings or a single listing via actor queries.
React hook that loads the Razorpay SDK and initiates subscription payments with validation and success/failure handlers.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of upcoming premium features with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Provides UI controls for customizing card background, typography, colors, alignment, decorations, and photo upload.
Handles exporting premium cards as images, sharing via WhatsApp/Instagram, and copying text.
Main module managing theme selection, customization workflow, and integrating preview and export components.
Renders a live preview of the premium card with selected theme, animations, text styles, and optional photo.
Defines a list of preset premium card themes and a helper to fetch a theme by ID.
Declares types for premium themes and designer state, including style options and theme structure.
Provides a React hook managing all premium card designer state with setters for customization options.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Implements daily quota tracking in localStorage with helpers to read, increment, and compute remaining quota.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: Combines backend and local quota logic to expose remaining messages, plan limits, and a mutation to record usage.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata, pricing, features, and entitlements for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers with lookup helpers.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: Renders locked content with a blur overlay and an Unlock Premium button that opens the pricing modal.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Displays the pricing modal with plan comparison and confirmation steps, integrating Razorpay for upgrades.
Renders a feature comparison table for Free, Pro, and Creator plans.
frontend/src/features/subscription/UPGRA: A testing checklist covering upgrade buttons, modal behavior, payment flow, and error cases.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: Computes the user's effective subscription plan and entitlements using react-query and authentication state.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: Fetches and exposes the user's subscription status with loading and fetched indicators.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: Displays a surprise message with confetti, audio playback, staged reveals, and handles loading or error states.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: Provides mutations and queries for creating surprise links and fetching surprise payloads via the backend.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns combined base and template-specific CSS classes for a given template ID.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Exports static background image paths and a helper to resolve them by key.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines all template metadata including IDs, names, icons, backgrounds, and color settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity changes and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear actions, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Tracks whether an element is in view using IntersectionObserver with optional one-time triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages plan selection per principal with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Verifies the caller's principal via the backend and returns it or null based on authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global styles, theme variables, and custom neon utility classes for animations and shadows.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements async clipboard copy with a textarea fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Provides helpers to format timestamps into relative time and human‑readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens long principal strings by keeping prefix and suffix characters.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds an encoded WhatsApp share link for a given text message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community posts section with tabs, post list, and dialogs for viewing and creating posts.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Displays the user dashboard with subscription info, activity data, and authentication gating.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Shows sample wishes with tone filtering and card-based display.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Provides a list of FAQs displayed using an accordion component with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, legal links, and a dynamic year plus caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Provides the birthday pack generator UI with form handling, quota checks, randomization, and generation actions.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the main landing hero with branding, social proof, auth prompts, and buttons to start generating or try the demo.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Shows Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy content in styled cards with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Implements the marketplace listing browser with filters, search, listing cards, and a dialog for creating new listings.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Displays generated birthday outputs with copy, share, download, and premium card creation actions.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Renders pricing plans with features, icons, and upgrade actions using a reveal animation and modal trigger.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Displays selectable card templates and a live preview using app context, template metadata, and reveal animations.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for Razorpay options, responses, and global window integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, neon colors, animations, and content paths.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env injection, path aliases, build settings, and local API proxying.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for WishMint AI.
